alert.note: Alert for Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; Western Ascension (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 03 at 10:49PM CST by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Ascension, northern St. James, southeastern Iberville and northern Assumption Parishes through 1115 PM CST... At 1048 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pierre Part, or near Belle River, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Gonzales, Donaldsonville, Napoleonville, Lutcher, White Castle, Sorrento, Paincourtville, Geismar, Convent and Belle Rose. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 174 and 188. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Assumption; Eastern Ascension; Iberville; St. James; Western Ascension
